Key:
I think today I'll stop by the arcade before
going home.
Oh, hello there Itsuka-kun.
Gah! Sensei?!

(When I entered the arcade, I suddenly
bumped into Tama-chan-sensei.)

Oh, don't worry about it, okay? I'm not here
to lecture you today.
Huh, really?
I do want you to study, but...
But I know how important it is to take breaks.
Whew.

(Yet again I'm saved by her understanding.
There are teachers who would immediately
launch into a scolding.)
By the way, um... Can you do this, Itsuka-kun?

Do this... you mean, the crane game? I think
I'm pretty good at it.
Really!
Then, well... May I ask you a favor?
A favor?

My cousin is partial to this character, so I'd
like to give it to her as a present.
Ohh, I see. That's fine.

(She doesn't look too good at claw games.
If that's the case, I'll help out a little.)
Oh, this one? Can you manage it?

All right. It's not too difficult. I could
get it in five tries.
All right! Got it!

(Thankfully, before I even hit a fifth try,
I was able to get the cat toy in question.
Whew. I'm glad I made good on it.)

Thank you so much! Gentlemen always
know how to help at the right moment.
It's not a big deal. Hope she likes it.
Yes, thank you.

(Yeah, it was a little thing, but it feels good
to do something nice.)
